name: Welcome To Skelington
description:
Welcome to Skelington!

Skelington

Kinda a reverse Atlantis, this hole-in-the-wall town now floats in the sky. And is beset on all sides by its humble inhabitants, the Skelis.

Skelis

These adorable abominations don't seem to want to leave you alone. Did you say something mean? Lucky for you they aren't too fast and they're a bit floppy. But they have numbers on their side.

Physics Nonsense

The Skelis don't have much holding them together (except for their unified hatred of you). They go all ragdoll-y if you get a couple clean shots off. Be sure to not trip over their bodies as you run from their still undead compatriots.

You

The haughty interloper, disturbing the peace of this once quiet town. Run for your life with WASD and Shift. Jump out of reach with Space. Fire and aim with the Mouse, and change weapons with 1, 2, and 3. Ammo is limited, and appears less and less over time, so be careful with your shots. Oh, and do your best not to get cornered. 

Huge thanks to Raphael Gonçalves da Silva, Quaternius, and Arludus for the readily-available models here on itch.io.
